title: I'm being called "boosted"?
body:
What does this mean exactly?

I'm in Bronze 4, was Bronze 5 when I was called "boosted" but I've been called this for a few games now and I'm sure there's another meaning behind it.

I took a year break, just starting this game again last week so have I missed out on the meaning behind this?

EDIT: I was also being called this in norms.

replies.body:
basically its calling a high elo player that got to their current rank by having their account elo boosted.

just ignore it.

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0YF5adBU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-27T12:04:48.611+0000)
>
> basically its calling a high elo player that got to their current rank by having their account elo boosted.
> 
> just ignore it.

Damn I must be a beast Bronze 5 then.
the majority or league youtubers/streamers use it so you know its gonna get spammed out of context by bronzies kek.

It's when you win but you didn't contribute much to team fights or enemy players suspect you of being helped rank up by friends who are very high of rank (usually silver to gold+) on a different low level account.  

I just solo lo lo lo lo lo lo lo lo almost every match. :l http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/y3y9Hcgn-aram-team-serious-aram-players-only?comment=0009

When someone is being 'boosted' it means that someone of a much higher skill level is playing on there account to rank it up, usually for money. It's completely against Riots rules and I'm pretty sure you can get permabanned for boosting/being boosted.

Anyway it basically evolved into an insult which you call someone when they are playing really badly. They are basically saying to you that you have been boosted and that you belong in a much lower elo.

Just ignore anyone who says it, they are just being toxic and mean.

> [{quoted}](name=Miicka,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0YF5adBU,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-08-27T16:16:11.188+0000)
>
> When someone is being 'boosted' it means that someone of a much higher skill level is playing on there account to rank it up, usually for money. It's completely against Riots rules and I'm pretty sure you can get permabanned for boosting/being boosted.
> 
> Anyway it basically evolved into an insult which you call someone when they are playing really badly. They are basically saying to you that you have been boosted and that you belong in a much lower elo.
> 
> Just ignore anyone who says it, they are just being toxic and mean.

But the thing is, I'm just a Bronze 5, playing a normals match doing really well and getting called boosted.

That's why I'm extremely confused.

> [{quoted}](name=xDarkRavenx,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0YF5adBU,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-08-27T16:20:40.869+0000)
>
> But the thing is, I'm just a Bronze 5, playing a normals match doing really well and getting called boosted.
> 
> That's why I'm extremely confused.

Yeah the insult doesn't really make that much sense lol.

Like I said, just ignore them, there trying to be mean
